summary: Persuasion's Armor is an armor that buffs speechcraft by 100 when you wear the full set. It is an enchanted ebony armor and it can be located in Pinepeak Cavern beside Ivarstead. A npc called Persuasion will be wearing it. He will be friendly so in order to get the armor you will have to kill. He's pretty tough so be careful. Beware there is a bear
descriptionHtml:
[size=4]This is my first mod so i hope that you enjoy it i want to keep modding so please endorse this. I would really appreciate it. Btw I made this was an old mod but i upgraded because an a**hole judged me for making it small. The armor is a little bit overpowered but i still hope you enjoy it.

Persuasion's Armor is an armor that buffs speechcraft by 100 when you wear the full set. It is an enchanted ebony armor and it can be located in Pinepeak Cavern beside Ivarstead. A npc called Persuasion will be wearing it. He will be friendly so in order to get the armor you will have to kill. He's pretty tough so be careful. Beware there is a bear[/size]
author: TheTrolledTroll
